name: Wizard punching quest
description:
Through the power of no context clues, reason, story, or literally any idea why he's here this idiot has come up with the personal quest of punching a wizard any wizard will do.  Have a gun; heck have two! kill Jorge then kill him again!  fight the twat who tells you mean things or talk to a cat who saves your game i literally don't care! 

forgive the poor spelling and punctuation i have no handle on reality and made this in a sleepless daze.  all in all enjoy and whatnot.
